title: NEWWORK logo.
content:
Hey guys!

Could somebody please help me identify the typeface.  
I thought it was a modified Didot but now I’m unsure.

The ’K’ is quite nice.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture5-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110026/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture5-2.png "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture5-2.png")

Thanks!
author: bobbygrotesk

comments.content:
Awesome!

Thanks alot Jan.  
Much appreciated.
